message.content:
cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.ST, cs.MA 

The paper deals with a multi-armed bandit problem with a risk-sensitive objective, which is a common problem in machine learning and optimization. The paper also discusses the use of a popular risk measure, Conditional Value-at-Risk (CVaR), which is commonly used in finance and risk management. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.GT (Game Theory), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.ST (Statistics), and cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems).
